# ablaut  

In an alphabetic system where vocals are not explicitly written, vocalic and other modifications of stems can be realized by determinants  

Usually in Sumerian verbs and nouns are inflected via e/iâ‡¨a/o change:  
gebe=>Gabe  
lege=>Lage  
sing=>Song
